title: Huge 4 Bedroom in East Passyunk
description:
Large renovated rowhome located in the heart of East Passyunk! With an updated kitchen, hardwood floors throughout, 4 bedrooms and 3 full bathroom, it's a must see! The first floor features a large living a dining room, beautiful kitchen with white cabinets and quartz counter tops, 1 bedroom and a full bath.
Make your way to the second floor where you'll find 3 bedrooms, 2 full baths, and a large laundry room. There is also a fully finished attic space for additional storage space and roof walk-out access.
The home close to many Passyunk favorites like Le Virtu, Pizza Plus, Juana Tamale and many more. Don't miss out on this spacious, gorgeous home, make your appointment today!
Listing courtesy of 	Elfant Wissahickon Realtors

title: Sixth and Girard Remodeled One Bedroom Apt Great Location $950
description:

Large living area with high ceilings and plenty of natural light. Modern kitchenette with oven and refrigerator. Large bedroom with closet and A/C unit. Bathroom with stand up shower. title: Stunning Fishtown Loft with Parking
description:
Stunning, industrial chic condo with parking! Located in the Historic Ribbon Factory building, this brilliant, well-kept condo has charm and character throughout! Venture inside the South facing, 4th floor unit to immerse yourself in the vast, open concept living space with soaring 19ft ceilings, wood flooring, exposed brick and wood beams, and center city views right from your windows! These windows also include sunshades, great for privacy or when needed, blocking the harsh sunlight.
The modern, chef's kitchen features gorgeous wood cabinetry, tiled backsplash, stainless steel appliances, a pantry, and a breakfast bar sitting 2+ bar stools comfortably. The first-floor bedroom, located near the entrance, is very spacious and features gorgeous wood flooring and great closet space! The full bathroom includes modern upgrades like, radiant floor heating, a stackable washer/dryer, stall shower/tub combo, a large vanity sink, and ample storage options!
Head on up the winding, iron, spiral staircase for the best part! Here you will find an incredible loft with panoramic views of the downstairs living space! This amazing loft is multi-purposeful, currently being used as a home office, could serve as a guest bedroom, additional living space, workout area, or whatever you need it to be! This condo unit also includes one, deeded parking space in the private, gated garage!
Located in the electric neighborhood of Fishtown, the options for evening dining, drinking, and entertainment are truly endless! Indulge in local favorites like Cook and Shaker, Circles and Squares, Hello Donuts + Coffee, Marthas and so many more! Check out Philadelphia Brewing, Penn Treaty Park, or Urban Axes Philadelphia for weekend entertainment.
Listing is courtesy of OCF Realty LLC

title: On-site bike storage, Bark park, Bocce ball field
description:
YES, WE ARE OPEN! CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR! OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!If you’re looking for a modern and hip space to call home, then look no further than Apex Manayunk. title: Brand-new two-bedroom loft in the Spring Arts section of Philadelphia!
description:
Be the first to live in this brand-new two-bedroom loft in the Spring Arts section of Philadelphia! This unit sits on the top floor of a beautifully restored carriage house. It is a stunning blend of industrial charm and modern sophistication. The spacious open-concept living space boasts vaulted exposed timber ceilings, large windows custom Anderson windows, and beautifully exposed brick walls that add character and warmth. The designer kitchen includes matte black cabinetry, a Samsung appliance package, and an oversized island with natural stone counters and backsplash! Perfect for entertaining guests or simply enjoying a meal at home. The living room is spacious, with plenty of natural light streaming in through the large windows, creating a bright and airy environment, coupled with exposed duct work running the length of the unit. Access control is through a Latch system, with full and total control via your mobile phone. Located in the vibrant neighborhood of Spring Arts, the property is located within walking distance to a brand new full-sized Giant grocer, gyms, cafes, hot new restaurants/bars, and concert venues! This is a quick walk to La Chinesca, Café Lift, Yards Brewery, Love City Brewery, Triple Bottom Brewery, Lucky Well, Juno, Reading Terminal, the newly built rail park, and many many more great establishments/destinations!

title: Storehouse Lofts
description:
Storehouse Lofts is a redeveloped apartment building with 161 residential units and ground-floor commercial space.
The building style promotes relaxed industrial features and exposed concrete ceilings that give the building a unique and cozy feel. The studio, one, and two-bed lofts feature an open concept with large windows that provide excellent natural light, stainless steel appliances, an in-unit washer/dryer, vaulted ceilings, rain head shower columns, and more. We are pet-friendly with no breed restrictions, so your furry friends are welcome to share your home.
Tenants can enjoy many amenities at Storehouse Lofts, such as a 24-hour front desk concierge, a fully equipped gym, a roof deck pool with gorgeous views of the city, a rooftop dog park, an indoor parking garage at an additional cost, a game room, storage units and so much more! We also have Bagels & Co and Brewerytown Food Hall opening within our commercial space come early 2023.
Located at 31st & Master St., you are within walking distance of the best restaurants/bars (Brewerytown Food Hall, 2637 Brew, Rybrew, Harpers Ice cream), cafes (The Monkey and Elephant & Lucky Goat Coffee House), and parks (Fairmount Park & Kelly Drive) the lively neighborhood of Brewerytown has to offer! You can also easily access I-676, I-95, I-76, Center City, and public transportation. Contact us today for more information on how to make Storehouse Lofts your new home in Philadelphia.

title: Listed on the National Historic Register, Elevator building
description: Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Our studio, one-bedroom, and two-bedroom apartments are designed with your comfort in mind, featuring large windows, hardwood floors, and expansive balconies or patios where you can take in the lush and natural landscape surrounding the property.
You'll love the amenities available to you, including a dog park, 24-hour fitness facility, laundry rooms throughout the property, and pool facilities.

title: *Then THIS lovely fully renovated gem is ready for you~~
description: Are you ready to fire your landlord, and pay your own mortgage instead of paying their mortgage? Then this lovely fully renovated gem is ready for you. The front exterior was recently painted, there is a covered front porch, and a huge rear yard with a cement patio, and high white privacy fencing. As you make your way inside you will find a lovely straight-through layout, which boasts a large, open concept living room /dining room space and large eat-in kitchen. There is new wood flooring, fresh paint, recessed lighting, and a ceiling fan with lighting kit. The eat in kitchen has also been freshly painted, and it is well appointed with 42 inches soft close cabinets, and drawers, beautiful decorative backsplash, and stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher. There are granite counter tops, a three stool counter with pass through window with pendant lighting. The kitchen also provides access to the rear yard and the basement.  The second floor has also been freshly painted and has the same wood flooring as the first floor. There are three nicely sized bedrooms with recessed lighting, a newly renovated bathroom, and a second floor washer and dryer. The 3rd level can be used as a loft or a 4th bedroom. The basement is fully finished and offers additional entertainment space, it can be used as an exercise area, and office or whatever else you as the new owner desires. There is also a new roof. This home is located close to schools, shopping, and transportation. Schedule your tour and make this one yours.

title: Spacious and One of the Best Apartment Buildings in Philadelphia!!
description:
The Metropolitan apartments in Center City, Philadelphia stand tall in the center of Philadelphia's historic skyline. Designed by French architect Louis Jallade in the 1920s, this twin-tower apartment building showcases 26 stories of Art Deco elegance and has a prominent history as the former Philadelphia YMCA Armed Forces Building. Before being transformed into the Center City apartment building it is today, The Metropolitan was home to United States servicemen during World War II. Today, The Metropolitan is recognized as one of the best apartment buildings in Philadelphia. You will find a spacious studio, 1-, 2-and 3-bedroom apartment rentals. As well as amenities that include a lounge, gym, basketball court and a rooftop with a gorgeous view of the City Hall and Love Park. The Metropolitan apartments feature original limestone details, terra-cotta tiles, and hand-carved cornices. Fall in love with restored architectural details and contemporary amenities, including renovated kitchens with luxurious personal touches.

description: Great Roxborough twin has more space than most in the neighborhood!  This larger, CORNER LOT home has been well maintained and has so much to offer.  An OPEN FLOOR PLAN that works! There is a beautiful five pane BAY WINDOW in the living room that brightens the entire first floor. The dining room is spacious enough to entertain your family and friends. The kitchen has great cabinet space and a window over the sink . You'll love the view of this large back yard. The dishwasher and garbage disposal were installed in 2019. Bedrooms have new carpeting,  ceiling fans and great closet space.  Windows are double pane ANDERSON  throughout this home .  All appliances are yours! The gas heater has a newer motor, installed in 2020. This large corner lot is fenced in and includes a newer large shed.  The one car garage provides inside access.  This is a great location!  Great neighborhood for taking walks. Minutes to the train, public transportation and  Manayunk.  Center City Phila. is a short drive.

title: Gorgeous 3-Bedroom apartment
description: Gorgeous 3-Bedroom apartment in Washington Square West! - This 3-Bedroom/1-Bathroom apartment  is located in Washington Square West - one of Philadelphia's most walkable neighborhoods! Surrounded by countless bars, restaurants, and shops, you will absolutely love this location. Additionally, it is located down a quiet, residential side street which means you'll enjoy the peace and quiet of virtually no traffic passing through!  move-in and we're accepting applications now! Arrive at the home and immediately fall in love with the traditional brick exterior. Entry into the home leads you directly into the living room which includes original hardwood flooring, tall ceilings, and a decorative fireplace with mantle. There is an exposed brick wall between the living room and kitchen which adds the perfect pop of character to the space as well. The living room also includes a coat closet for storage. The kitchen has been recently renovated and includes stone tile flooring, light oak cabinets, granite countertops, stainless steel refrigerator, four-burner gas range, and dishwasher. There is a moveable island included which offers additional counterspace or can be used as a dining area! The fenced-in patio is located directly off of the kitchen and is the perfect spot for outdoor relaxation. With enough space for an outdoor furniture set and a grill, you will love entertaining friends in this space! The first two bedrooms are located on the second floor of the home and are a comfortable size. They include hardwood flooring, ample closet space, and large windows which allow tons of natural light to pour in and make the entire space feel incredibly open and bright. The third bedroom is located on the third floor of the home and is large enough to accommodate a queen-sized bed with ease! The bathroom is located in the hallway and is easily accessible from all three bedrooms. It includes stone tile flooring, pedestal sink with large mirror, and a bathtub/shower with an incredible tile surround. There is also a built-in cabinet which is perfect for storing your linens and other bathroom essentials! In addition to all of the great features throughout the home, there is also an unfinished basement which can be used for additional storage or a work bench. The basement also includes a full-sized washer and dryer! Tenants are responsible for electric, gas, water, and cable/internet in addition to rent. More specific information provided with the application. To set up a showing of this property send your number and mail address.

description: ABSOLUTELY BEAUTIFUL 3 BEDROOM WEST PHILADELPHIA TOWNHOUSE WITH PRIVATE GARAGE PARKING - A unique opportunity to rent this truly gorgeous 4 bedroom house in the Penn Alexander School Catchment Area with an attached garage offering 2 CAR PARKING! The owners have spared no expense in upgrading this house over the past 2/3 years to create this beautiful home with 3 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms. This house is located on this blissfully quiet tree- lined street with all the wonderful amenities of this great neighborhood. From the porch you enter into the front light-filled vestibule area which opens into the expansive living room, through to the dining area and into an exquisite kitchen. The stainless steel appliances are all of the highest standard with a Haier fridge/freezer, wood island, beautiful cabinetry and a large gas range with a hood-truly a chef's kitchen! The stairs lead to the 2nd floor where there are 2 rear interconnecting bedrooms with plenty of closet space, a large middle bedroom and a large master bedroom, all with built in closets. The full bathroom on this floor is very spacious and tastefully tiled with a skylight. The basement is completely finished, offering ample storage space and an area that is currently used as a den and could be a spare bedroom/guest area. A second full bathroom is adjacent to this area. There is a laundry area with a full size Samsung washer and dryer. There is direct access to the large attached garage from the basement, or from the steps leading from the back door of the kitchen. The garage is accessed by a wide private lane, directly behind the property, allowing ample room for a second vehicle to park outside the garage, this area is private to the house. The oak flooring of the house, inlaid with walnut, has been restored and is absolutely beautiful! The house also has a split cooling/heating system in the rooms which is adaptable for selective cooling and heating combined with standard radiator heat. This is a superb location, within a few minutes walk to Clark Park and its terrific Farmers Market, all the local coffee shops and restaurants, Baltimore Ave Restaurant Row, CVS and the local movie theater. Walk to Hup, Penn, CHOP, Drexel, University of the Sciences and just 11 minutes to Center City by car plus convenient Septa options. This wonderful neighborhood has a 96 walk and bike score.
